name: Francesca Restelli
subtitle: Marketing & PR Manager at Rhenus Logistics Italy
about: As a marketing and communications manager I coordinate not only advertising but even public relations activities. Thanks to my knowhow and long experience in communication in this field (freight forwarder)  I have improved my skills in maximizing co-operation both national or Worldwide, maintening branding and corporate identity.
experiences: Head of Marketing & HR Marketing Region South Road Freight

I'm Marketing and PR Manager  Rhenus Logistics Italy in staff to our Managing Director.
Regarding the internal communication I manage relationship with the Headquarters in Holzwickede (Germany) and  nationally with all our 31 italian branches. I’m strictly working with the H.R Director in order to improve the brand awareness.
I provide articles for internal newsletter. As regard the external communication I'm the referee for the italian press. Communications follow corporate guidelines and corporate identity.
I organize events and meetings at international and national level.

I won a scholarship (1 year) as “Data Manager”, renewed when expired for another year, at Desio Hospital, in Urology department. 
Activities: full organisation of International Congresses, meetings and up-to-date courses, keeping in touch with pharmaceutical agent's, clinical-experimental administration, patients contacts, secretarial organisation.

I began with a stage for 6 months, then extended to other 6 months at Sperling & Kupfer and Frassinelli Editors (Mondadori Group),  at Press Office in order to do secretarial activity and to reorganise the author archive

posts.post: 📦 Rivoluziona il tuo modo di spedire con il nostro Servizio di Groupage! 🌍Nel cuore della logistica di Pesenti Trasporti e Logistica, il servizio di Groupage rappresenta la quintessenza dell'efficienza e dell'innovazione. 🚚💨 Grazie alla nostra recente collaborazione con Rhenus, siamo orgogliosi di annunciare l'espansione del nostro servizio di spedizioni, che ora copre ogni angolo d'Europa ogni singolo giorno!🌐 La nostra rete si estende ora più che mai, assicurandovi una copertura senza precedenti e la possibilità di raggiungere i vostri clienti in tutta Europa con facilità e affidabilità.
